note: Title for works from added title page to each work (f. 1r, 35r).
Owner's notes and one effaced stamp (flyleaf 1 recto at the front, f. 1r, 35r)

msContents.summary: Composite manuscript of works related to al-Mufaḍḍal al-Abharī. The first is an abridgment and commentary on his philosophical work Hidāyat al-ḥikmah and the second is his astronomical treatise Risālah fī ʻilm al-hayʼah. If a third work was included, as the table of contents written on the first flyleaf suggests, it is no longer present. A short poem by Ibn Daqīq al-ʻĪd al-Qushayrī is copied onto a blank page between the two works.

title: Sharḥ Hidāyat al-ḥikmah. Risālah fī ʻilm al-hayʼah.

title.#text: شرح هداية الحكمة. رسالة في علم الهيئة

ابن الشريف الجرجاني، محمد بن علي،

ابن دقيق العيد، محمد بن علي،
Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī, al-Mufaḍḍal ibn ʻUmar, -1265
اثير الدين الابهري، المفضل بن عمر،
Athīr al-Dīn al-Abharī, al-Mufaḍḍal ibn ʻUmar, -1265
اثير الدين الابهري، المفضل بن عمر،

msItem.title: Poem by Ibn Daqīq al-ʻĪd al-Qushayrī

supportDesc.extent: 49 pages : 180 x 120 (130 x 90) mm, bound to 180 x 135 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink; pointed.

binding.p: Bound in modern cardboard with flap; printed red and blue leaf and fruit patterned sides; plain light blue paper pastedowns; red leather spine and flap hinge.

origin.p: Copy of the first work completed on 23 Muḥarram 901 (October 1495) by ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Saʻīrī (f. 34r). Second work is undated.
